title: I Have Owned Two Electric Skateboards
alt: Both the skateboards I owned were pretty cheap and broke from heavy use; I'm gonna get a really nice one if I move to the city.
transcript:
[Caption above the panels:]
How electric skateboards work:[Cueball is standing on a skateboard, just to the right of a sign. he pushes a button on the remote he has in his hand. The remote is connected to his skateboard through a wire.]
Sign: Point A
Click[Cueball skates while he stands still on the board.]
Whirrrr[He stops just in front of another sign saying. To his left is three girls; Megan, Ponytail and another Megan-like girl with even longer hair than the first. Below them are three arrows pointing to each of them and a label connected to all three arrow.]
Sign: Point B
Label: Chicks
